participant_1.background:
I met my birth mother when i was sixteen.
I was adopted.
I work at a local party store.
Christmas is my favorite holiday.

participant_2.background:
I can be quite forgetful.
I was raised by two mothers.
I am not afraid of what others think.
My boyfriend works for nasa.
My favorite food is spaghetti and meatballs.

content.text: I was adopted and met my birth mother when I was sixteen. How was it growing up with two mothers?
I was raised by two moms and I loved it! They were both so loving and supportive. I always felt like I had a lot of love in my life.
That's great! I'm glad you had a good experience. I was adopted too, but I didn't meet my birth mother until I was an adult.
What was it like meeting her for the first time?
It was a little strange at first, but it was also really nice to get to know her. We had a lot in common, and it was cool to learn about her life.
That's so cool! I'm glad you had a good experience.
Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, read, and watch movies. I also love to go on walks with my dog.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and watch movies too. I also love to go for walks, but I don't have a dog.
That's okay! You can always borrow my dog. He loves to go for walks.
Thanks! I might take you up on that.
You're welcome! So, what's your favorite food?
That's a good choice! I love it too.
I'm glad we have something in common.
